value:
$nMPID_レア|An archbishop must be sound of
judgment, strict of word and deed.
Still...everyone needs time to relax.

$nMPID_レア|I have not visited a beach since
before I became archbishop. I had
nearly forgotten the sea's beauty.

$nMPID_ベレス|I wonder if any students from the
academy have made their way here
today. I will have to keep an eye out.

$nMPID_ベレス|They certainly do a thorough job
cleaning up here. I've not found
a single lost item lying around...

$nMPID_ベレス|Askr must be home to all kinds of
interesting fish. I should have thought
to bring my rod along.

$nMPID_レア|Greetings, $Nu.
Your friend $Nf
hopes you are enjoying the sun.

$nMPID_レア|I have faith that this power shall be
applied toward the common good.
$nMPID_レア|Jeralt has trained you well.

$nMPID_ベレス|Take care of your skin, Lady Rhea.
It would not do for you to burn.
$nMPID_レア|Thank you for all of your efforts.

I am Rhea, Archbishop of the Church
of Seiros. Byleth and I hope to take
our ease on the beach together.

$nMPID_レア|Have you enjoyed your summer thus
far, Byleth? It must be a fine change
of pace from the labor of instruction.$k$p$nMPID_ベレス|Teaching is hard work. As much as I
might miss the students, it is good
to get a break.$k$p$nMPID_レア|All the power in the world means
little without the energy to use it.$k$pA bowstring held taut too long loses
its power to draw. It is much the
same with people.$k$p$nMPID_ベレス|Wise words, Lady Rhea. I agree that
rest is essential. I'll be sure to get
plenty of it while I can.
(exertion)
Back to the depths!
(exertion)
You're going under!
$nMPID_二人|Tropical attack!
$nMPID_二人|With me, Lady Rhea? Always.
$nMPID_ベレス|It's a beautiful day!
$nMPID_レア|Eternity awaits.
How uncouth...
A little too...carefree...
I expect great things.
Such is our devotion.

• "I'll handle this."
• "Allow me to aid you."

• "The wicked will be judged!"
• "Stay focused..."
So bright...

• "Care for a drink?"
• "I would not refuse."
As ordained.
Let's enjoy ourselves.
Listen to the waves...
$nMPID_ベレス|I could do with a break.
$nMPID_レア|We have played hard, haven't we?

$nMPID_ベレス|Been a while since I've seen a beach.
How about you, Lady Rhea?

$nMPID_レア|Come to think of it, yes. It has been
some time.

Tranquility of the sea... The caress
of the waves... I had all but forgotten.

$nMPID_ベレス|Well, now we can experience it
whenever we like.
$nMPID_レア|In this world, at least.

$nMPID_ベレス|Should we invite Seteth and Flayn
next time?

$nMPID_レア|That would be lovely. The students
should come along as well.

$nMPID_ベレス|All of them? We'd have our
hands full.

$nMPID_レア|Yes, we have our share
of troublemakers.

$nMPID_ベレス|All in good fun. Their hearts are
in the right place.

$nMPID_レア|As is yours. You truly are...so kind.
Just like...
$nMPID_ベレス|Hm?

$nMPID_レア|Oh, it is nothing.$k$pWould you care to take a walk down
by the water with me? I hear the fish
in this area are resplendent.
$nMPID_ベレス|Of course.

$nMPID_レア|Come, then. Let us, for once, relax
and enjoy life's simple pleasures.
